# 3A Automation - AI Automation Agency
> Last updated: 2026-02-06

## About
3A Automation (AAA) is an AI automation agency specializing in e-commerce (B2C) and SMB (B2B) workflow automation. We build and operate 121 tested automation workflows powered by frontier AI models.

## Services
- **E-commerce Automation**: Shopify, WooCommerce, Magento, PrestaShop, BigCommerce
- **Email Marketing**: Klaviyo, Mailchimp, HubSpot, Omnisend flow automation
- **Marketing Analytics**: GA4, GTM, Meta Ads, TikTok Ads, Google Ads
- **Voice AI**: Web widget + telephony via VocalIA.ma (FR, EN, AR, ES)
- **Content Automation**: Blog, podcast, video generation with AI
- **Flywheel 360**: Holistic methodology - Acquisition, Conversion, Retention, Advocacy

## Technology Stack
- **AI Models**: Claude 4.6 (Opus), Grok 4.1, Gemini 3 Flash, GPT-5.2, ElevenLabs Flash v2.5
- **Infrastructure**: Node.js native workflows, Next.js 14 dashboard, Docker
- **Protocols**: MCP (Model Context Protocol), A2A, GPM (Global Pressure Matrix)
- **Resilience**: Faldown fallback logic across all AI providers
- **Monitoring**: 19 real-time sensors, 177 automated tests (100% pass)

## Workflow Ecosystem (121 automations)
### Lead Generation & Acquisition
- Meta/TikTok/Google Ads automated creative
- LinkedIn B2B scraping, Google Maps local sourcing
- Apify trends monitoring, viral hook generation

### Conversion & Optimization
- AEO semantic hardening (Answer Engine Optimization)
- Dynamic pricing with geo-locale (EUR, USD, MAD)
- Voice AI widget for real-time lead qualification

### Retention & CRM
- Shopify Flow behavioral triggers
- Churn prediction with GA4 AI signals
- Klaviyo flow automation (abandoned cart, post-purchase, win-back)
- Personalized email and SMS automation

### Advocacy & Growth
- Automated NPS and referral loops
- UGC reward sensors (TikTok/Instagram)
- Loyalty tier automation
- Strategic content generation (blog, podcast)

## HITL Coverage (18/18 workflows)
All critical workflows include Human-in-the-Loop approval gates for financial, communication, content, and cost-control operations.

## Pricing
- **Quick Win**: 390 EUR / 450 USD / 3,900 MAD (1 workflow + audit)
- **Essentials**: 790 EUR / 920 USD / 7,900 MAD (3 workflows + A/B tests)
- **Growth**: 1,399 EUR / 1,690 USD / 13,990 MAD (5 workflows + dashboard)
- **Monthly retainers**: from 290 EUR / 330 USD / 2,900 MAD

## Markets
- Morocco (French, MAD)
- Europe (French, EUR)
- International (English, USD)

## Subsidiaries
- **VocalIA.ma**: Voice AI platform for MENA & Europe
- **CinematicAds.studio**: AI video production

- EU AI Act 2026 compliant
- GDPR/RGPD verified
- SSL/HTTPS enforced
- Zero mock certification (all workflows tested)
